AI Description: r-openssl provides an encryption toolkit for R users to use OpenSSL cryptographic library functions. It allows users to perform cryptographic operations such as encryption, decryption, signing, and verification.
Core Features: Encryption & Decryption Functionality Using Openssl Library, Digital Signing & Verification Capabilities, Support For Various Cryptographic Algorithms, Integration With R Environment For Data Security
General Tags: Encryption, Data Security, Cryptographic Operations, Openssl Library, R Package
